pr_title: Generate CustomType enum constants ordered by name

timeline.message:
Generate CustomType enum constants ordered by name

Closes https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/1928

timeline.bodyText: Is it intentional to call toSortedMap 2 times?
timeline.author: tasomaniac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,12 +13,14 @@ internal fun CustomTypes.typeSpec(generateAsInternal: Boolean = false) =
         .applyIf(generateAsInternal) { addModifiers(KModifier.INTERNAL) }
         .addSuperinterface(ScalarType::class.java)
         .apply {
-          map { (schemaType, customType) ->
-            addEnumConstant(
-                name = schemaType.normalizeGraphQLType().toUpperCase(),
-                typeSpec = enumConstantTypeSpec(schemaType = schemaType, customType = customType)
-            )
-          }
+          toSortedMap()

timeline.bodyText:
Comparing left and right is already the default behavior. Just sorting also works.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    .toSortedMap(Comparator { left, right -> left.compareTo(right) })
          
          
            
                    .toSortedMap()
timeline.author: tasomaniac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,11 +19,13 @@ class CustomEnumTypeSpecBuilder(
           .build()
 
   private fun TypeSpec.Builder.addEnumConstants(): TypeSpec.Builder {
-    context.customTypeMap.forEach { mapping ->
-      val constantName = mapping.key.removeSuffix("!").toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH)
-      val javaTypeName = mapping.value
-      addEnumConstant(constantName, scalarMappingTypeSpec(mapping.key, javaTypeName))
-    }
+    context.customTypeMap
+        .toSortedMap(Comparator { left, right -> left.compareTo(right) })

timeline.author: tasomaniac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,12 +13,14 @@ internal fun CustomTypes.typeSpec(generateAsInternal: Boolean = false) =
         .applyIf(generateAsInternal) { addModifiers(KModifier.INTERNAL) }
         .addSuperinterface(ScalarType::class.java)
         .apply {
-          map { (schemaType, customType) ->
-            addEnumConstant(
-                name = schemaType.normalizeGraphQLType().toUpperCase(),
-                typeSpec = enumConstantTypeSpec(schemaType = schemaType, customType = customType)
-            )
-          }
+          toSortedMap()
+              .toSortedMap(Comparator { left, right -> left.compareTo(right) })

timeline.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Said Tahsin Dane <tasomaniac@gmail.com>
